resources.string: Create a Backup of WhatsApp Data

Hey, do you like WhatsApp but do you want more privacy and more settings? Install KWhatsApp and enjoy WhatsApp like never before! Download Now:- https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/117929374559788388477
Please restart WhatsApp for changes to take effect.
